attributes.title: i wish i could give no stars
attributes.review: loved the app until the big orange scary man had his pictures up all over the app. i had no idea who he was and it made me very uncomfortable, also his content seemed racist and slightly homophobic. i thought this was a video game and ended it up giving me nightmares. i wish there was a zero star button.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a pig screaming into a crowd of complete idiots this is a disgusting app I hope this app gets deleted. I am very unhappy with this app and hope Donald J trump gets in a car crash and bangs his head in 💗

attributes.title: Not what I came for
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get away from those snowflakes and turns out the pretty much run the platform! DISGUSTING!!!!! Never downloading again!!

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible app
attributes.review: I think you know why other than the lags and crashes.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: Besides the owner of this app being a white supremacist, this app is horrible. The layout messes with my aesthetic and throws off my chakra. Totally bad vibes and it not very cash money either.

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the big Cheeto but my phone kept crashing and overall the app was not helpful.
